meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unlike.
meanings.sent1: The unlikeness between the two twins was striking.
meanings.sent2: There was a clear unlikeness between the two paintings.
meanings.sent3: The unlikeness in their taste in music always led to interesting conversations.
meanings.sent4: The unlikeness of their personalities made them a perfect match.
meanings.sent5: The unlikeness in their styles made for a fascinating collaboration.

meanings.definition: A lack of resemblance or similarity.
meanings.sent1: The unlikeness in their features made it hard to believe they were siblings.
meanings.sent2: There was an unlikeness in their approaches to problem-solving.
meanings.sent3: The unlikeness in their fashion choices always sparked friendly debates.
meanings.sent4: The unlikeness in their opinions created an interesting dynamic.
meanings.sent5: The unlikeness in their interests led to diverse conversations.
